text: Uppala railway station (Code: UAA) is a railway station in Kasaragod District, Kerala and falls under the Palakkad railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways.Uppala railway station ==References== * http://indiarailinfo.com/arrivals/uppala-uaa/2779 Category:Palakkad railway division Category:Railway stations in Kasaragod district Category:Manjeshwar area
title: Uppala railway station
